TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpApplicationStateBase extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class HttpApplicationStateBase Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase Implements ICollection
public ref class HttpApplicationStateBase abstract : System::Collections::Specialized::NameObjectCollectionBase, System::Collections::ICollection
type HttpApplicationStateBase = class inherit NameObjectCollectionBase interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 用做類別的基底類別，這些類別可在 ASP.NET 應用程式中，跨多個工作階段和要求共用資訊。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that enable information to be shared across multiple sessions and requests within an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，而且 ASP.NET 管線外運作。The class lets you create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例使用的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，因此您通常使用的執行個體類別來呼叫的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 項目宣告的所有物件，其中範圍在 ASP.NET 應用程式中設定為 "Application"。
